effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
